root.name: NBA 2K10
root.description: NBA 2K10 FeaturesNBA Today - Real world matchups, news and stats are automatically streamed right into the game. Also roster updates that reflect the current NBA season (trades, injuries, player ratings).My Player Mode - Players can create their own basketball player and guide him through his career. Starting as an undrafted rookie in the Summer Circuit, players will have to work their way up into an NBA team’s training camp, or in the D-League.Signature Play - New signature player styles, tendencies, dribble packages, dunk packages, and facial expressions.Reworked Gameplay - New easy-to-use dribbling and post game controls. New Stamina system.Deeper Association - The Association now incorporates the NBA Development League, the ability to control all 30 NBA teams at once, restricted free agency, real-time practice, an all-new player progression system, and a host of other enhancements.Shut Down D - Shut down teams with new defensive controls that allow you to shadow your opponent’s every move, deny position off-ball, and even select how you want to contest shots.Improved Create-A-Player Mode - Players can now customize their player's facial styles, tattoos, and shoes. Also included are new dunk packages, dribble packages, signature leaners, floaters and post moves.Save Quit - A new gameplay feature that allows you to save a game right where you are and come back to it later to the point where you saved it.Anniversary EditionAlong with the standard edition of the game, an Anniversary edition will be available which includes:NBA 2k10 video gameNumbered 2k Sports game storage locker with combination lockExclusive McFarlane Kobe Bryant figurineExclusive 2k Sports Kobe Bryant posterNBA 2k10 10th Anniversary video exploring the history of the NBA 2k franchiseAccess to the Gold Room, NBA 2k10's VIP online lobbyThe Anniversary Edition will be available on Ps3 and 360 versions.
